name: Okiku
ability: Skill targets take sharply more DMG.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a Japanese doll with hair that actually grows. The elaborate workmanship of this doll was unexpectedly ill-received, and it gained a reputation for being cursed. Because of the well-known rumor of the doll's hair growing, the spirit's hair keeps growing, too, and it takes up a lot of her time caring for it every day. If she skips even one day, it's enough to make her unrecognizable.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 15/02/17- 08/03/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 05/03/17 - 08/03/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases skill DMG of allies by 33% during the "The Spirits' Doll Festival" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 15/02/17- 08/03/17

skill: "I'm going to scare you out of your skin!"
